text: Eduardo Guillermo Bonvallet Godoy (January 13, 1955 â€“ September 18, 2015), was a Chilean footballer. He played as a defensive midfielder and later developed a TV and radio sports commentator career. Bonvallet was found dead by hanging using a belt at Nogales Hotel in the kitchen of room 213. Local news report he was suffering from depression. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Suicides by hanging Category:Footballers from Santiago
title: Eduardo Bonvallet
